entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
